title: Lovakengj Minecart Network

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Lovakengj Minecart Network, or the Great Kourend Minecart System, is a type of transportation used to travel around the five cities of Great Kourend. Players must have gained at least 65% Lovakengj Favour to use the minecart system.

content:
The Lovakengj Minecart Network, or the Great Kourend Minecart System, is a type of transportation used to travel around the five cities of Great Kourend. Players must have gained at least 65% Lovakengj Favour to use the minecart system.

All of the travel services offered by the minecarts cost 50 coins per ride. Players can ride the carts for free after paying a one-off fee of 100,000 coins to Miriam at the Lovakengj station.

Before being able to use the minecart system, players must speak to Miriam south of the Lovakengj bank, marked with a icon. The player must take five minecart control scrolls to the other four cities and the Mount Quidamortem station added with the addition of raids, to fully access the minecart system. Delivering the scrolls will grant players 5% Lovakengj favour for each scroll delivered.

The minecart system offers five routes across Great Kourend, and one to Mount Quidamortem in the Kebos Lowlands.

Locations
Miriam, the Lovakengj station conductor.
Loinur, the Arceuus station conductor.
Mogrim, the Shayzien station conductor.
Traxi, the Hosidius station conductor.
Raeli, the Port Piscarilius station conductor.
Stuliette, the Mount Quidamortem station conductor.
